articles.title: European countries could be added to travel red list, warns health minister - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Gillian Keegan says the Government will take immediate action on foreign travel if there is a flare-up in cases of the new omicron variant
articles.content:
Number of passengers falls

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: Closest pair of supermassive black holes are spotted just 1,600 light years apart in the sky - Daily Mail
articles.description: Astronomers detected the two objects using the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope in Chile and said they were about 89 million light-years away from Earth.
articles.content:
The closest pair of supermassive black holes to Earth ever seen have been observed by astronomers.
They said the two objects which are just 1,600 light-years apart also have a much smaller separatio… [+5233 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Rise in German Covid-19 infections flattens - Times of India
articles.description: Europe News: BERLIN: Germany reported another 45,753 new coronavirus cases and 388 deaths on Tuesday, but the seven-day incidence of cases per 100,000 people fell .
articles.content: Rise in German Covid-19 infections flattens
